cu.explanation_en: Setting the RLC log level to an invalid value will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper RLC layer debugging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink absolute frequency point A to zero will invalidate the frequency configuration and prevent proper downlink carrier setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行鏈路絕對頻率點 A 設定為零會使頻率配置無效，並阻止正確的下行鏈路載波設定。
